Omiscid::Event

Omiscid::Event Class Reference

Event or condition implementation (similarly to Win32 API). More...

#include <System/Event.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 Event ()
 Constructor.

 Virtual destructor.
void Signal ()
 Signal all the threads waiting on this event.
void Reset ()
 Reset the event.
bool Wait (unsigned long timer=0)
 Block the thread.

Detailed Description

Event or condition implementation (similarly to Win32 API).

Enable a thread to wait on a condition, until be awoken by another thread.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

Sebastien Pesnel

bool Event::Wait ( unsigned long  timer = 0  ) 

Block the thread.

Block the thread on this event until another thread signal the event, during a maximum of 'timer' milliseconds (if 'timer' is not null) It should have been const but the pthread API make problems...

Parameters:
[in] timer timeout in milliseconds. 0 to wait an infinite time.
